issue.title: [Release][OSX] Verification script fails to activate conda environment
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5837](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5837). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Faced issue https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/8186
I was using it on OSX, within tmux and zsh (probably caused by the nested shells).

Solution is to export PS1="" at https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/release/verify-release-candidate.sh#L236

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5837?focusedCommentId=16878135) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
ARROW-5820 resolved this.
